summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2091 for the improvement of Fairview Avenue, from Mercer Street to Lake Union, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same with five inch planks, to a width of twenty (20) feet; under Ordinance No. 21185, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
